verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

verses.esv: 1:1 In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
verses.kjv: 1 In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
verses.niv: 1 In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

verses.esv: 6 Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
verses.kjv: 6 Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
verses.niv: 6 Jesus answered, "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

verses.esv: 33 But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
verses.kjv: 33 But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
verses.niv: 33 But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 16 Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.
verses.kjv: 16 Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
verses.niv: 16 Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, 9 not a result of works, so that no one may boast.
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: 9 Not of works, lest any man should boast.
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God-- 9 not by works, so that no one can boast.

verses.esv: 35 In all things I have shown you that by working hard in this way we must help the weak and remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he himself said, ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.’”
verses.kjv: 35 I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.
verses.niv: 35 In everything I did, I showed you that by this kind of hard work we must help the weak, remembering the words the Lord Jesus himself said: 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'"

verses.esv: 18 And I tell you, you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
verses.kjv: 18 And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
verses.niv: 18 And I tell you that you are Peter, and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hades will not overcome it.

verses.esv: 19 And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 19 But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 19 And my God will meet all your needs according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.”
verses.kjv: 9 Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.niv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be terrified; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go."

verses.esv: 10 For whoever keeps the whole law but fails in one point has become guilty of all of it.
verses.kjv: 10 For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.
verses.niv: 10 For whoever keeps the whole law and yet stumbles at just one point is guilty of breaking all of it.

verses.esv: 5 Keep your life free from love of money, and be content with what you have, for he has said, “I will never leave you nor forsake you.”
verses.kjv: 5 Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
verses.niv: 5 Keep your lives free from the love of money and be content with what you have, because God has said, "Never will I leave you; never will I forsake you."

verses.esv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.
verses.kjv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.niv: 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

verses.esv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
verses.kjv: 23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.niv: 23 For the wages of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.esv: 9 And the Lord said to Paul one night in a vision, “Do not be afraid, but go on speaking and do not be silent,
verses.kjv: 9 Then spake the Lord to Paul in the night by a vision, Be not afraid, but speak, and hold not thy peace:
verses.niv: 9 One night the Lord spoke to Paul in a vision: "Do not be afraid; keep on speaking, do not be silent.

verses.esv: 36 Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life; whoever does not obey the Son shall not see life, but the wrath of God remains on him.
verses.kjv: 36 He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
verses.niv: 36 Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life, but whoever rejects the Son will not see life, for God's wrath remains on him."

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 19 Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit,
verses.kjv: 19 Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:
verses.niv: 19 Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit,

4   Delight yourself in the LORD,
    and he will give you the desires of your heart.
verses.kjv: 4 Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.niv: 4 Delight yourself in the LORD and he will give you the desires of your heart.
